attributes.action: Change general election voting to once a year.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians are not sticking to there word and the people are not happy. 5 years is too long and a lot of damage can be done in that time so a year is more appropriate.
attributes.background: Change general election voting to once a year, so if the party in power doesn't hold up there policy's the people have the chance to change but if they do a good job then the people can revote them in. This then makes them more likely to stick to there word and policy's they got voted in for.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a General Election once every twelve months" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733034
